text:
A Chaotic Gathering

A cramped room filled with mismatched guests.  
Katerina Ivanovna watches, fuming silently.  
Katerina: “Who are these people?”  
Guest: “I just came for the food.”  
Another Guest: “What a mess this is!”  

---  

The children sit neglected on a bench.  
Polenka tries to feed them while frowning.  
Polenka: “This isn’t fair!”  
Child: “I want to sit at the table!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna feels frustrated and disrespected by the unrefined guests at her gathering, highlighting her struggle to maintain dignity amidst chaos.
